title: A Baby For The Millionaire
description: Jenny Carpenter is a recent college grad who can't believe her luck to be working as a social media director for one of the biggest media empires in the world. Unfortunately for her she got the job based on a lie and her first day is anything other than what she expects.Hamilton Verano is millionaire whose mind is on business and fun. He's looking for a new personal assistant who will help organize every area of his life. He doesn't want a relationship and he doesn't want love.Neither Jenny or Hamilton knew what was in store for them on her first day of work.
author: Helen    Cooper
